cause.description:
Kids can read good. And I'm pretty sure there's a lot more to life than being really, really good looking. And I plan on finding out what that is.
1. Educating children is critical to their future.
2. Collectively, we can make a difference!
3. Reading is FUNdamental
cause.name: Derek Zoolander Center For Kids Who Can't Read Good and Wanna Learn to Do Other Stuff Good Too
